description: While tossing a football around the game room Mark Talon tells Phenix Saint that he wrestled and played football in high school because he has a lot of testosterone. Phenix knocks the football out of Mark's hands and the two beefy hunks start to wrestle. Before you know it Phenix has his fat cock down Mark's throat and orders housemate Trent Locke to come in and fuck Mark's huge bubble-butt. Mark may have the testosterone but Phenix has the balls - he shouts orders and dominates the action - making sure both young hunks get their turn in the middle. Trent ends up on his knees covered in loads of cum!
title: The Dude Show 1, Scene #05
